testcase.name: OrangeHRM Login Scenario
testcase.system-out: Given "https://opensource-demo.orangehrmlive.com/web/index.php/auth/login" sitesini aç..passed Then Login syfasında olduğunu doğrula.......................................passed And Enter username as "Admin"...............................................passed And Enter password as "admin123"............................................passed And Click Login button......................................................passed Then Verify on login page...................................................passed
